name: Escape from the Bot Factory
description:
Welcome to my game!

Escape from the Bot Factory

The Controls:

A and D - move the character left and right

Space - Jump

Q - Self Destruct

Esc - opens the menu

What you do:

You control a small bot and help him escaping the factory (or actually the warehouse part of this factory). Along the way you have to self destruct the bot, when respawned, the dead bot can be used as help to reach the end.

Have fun!

My thoughts:           --(nothing important about the game will be below here)--

Yes this is my first game i created solo, outside of Guides and Courses...

And i know this game is far from good and there is a lot where i could improve.  But i im happy, that i participated in this game jam, because now i know some of my weaknesses. And i had fun doing this :)

And lastly i really urge you to leave feedback.  what do you think?

Git Hub: https://github.com/Schnitzel28/Schnitzel-GameJam2022
